Tucson hears his voice and immediately realizes that the bird is actually R=
odimus.  He widens his eyes and dives toward him, flying over his leader wi=
th out stretched wings, acting like a shield to protect him and Nightlight.=
  He looks down.

" Sorry, slight miscalculation, won't happen again.  I th=
ought the clouds held water but they don't .  If I knew there was water I c=
ould stop the ash and fire.  I must try to climb higher, beyond the smoke c=
over.  But first your saftey is most imperative.  Get into my talons, you w=
ill be safe in there under my draconic armor."

He opens his talons to rece=
ive his comrades.  Ash rains down on his wings and back yet he ignores the =
sting and burn of their impact.

> <NEW>
>

tern, it is conceivable that a lightning strike of

pour, and yes there were black clouds that
> were floating above the volcan=
o and the surrounding trees.

at began to fall on the ground below.

actly like RODIMUS' even his

is body and wings

you doing Tuscon?!?" RODIMUS said.
